'''Straight To The Point''' is a [[Badges|badge]] that can be obtained by playing the mission [[Pinkus' duty (Ch. 1)]] on the island of [[Iron Bay]].

Objective: <big style="color:yellow">Don't step foot in the main prison yard (the one with the L shaped pit).</big>
